content: to share it for you you may not duplicate or share this pattern in any way thank you simply dk by paintbox yarns find and join hanjan crochet here 100% acrylic 276m/100g larksfoot blanket | ©hanjan crochet | 2 larksfoot blanket uk terminology us terminology i changed colour after every two row in a random i changed colour after every two row in a random combination but you can do whatever you like with combination but you can do whatever you like with your blanket to make it your own your blanket to make it your own foundation chain ch100 or any multiple of 4 foundation chain ch100 or any multiple of 4 row 1 treble_crochet in 3rd chain from hook treble_crochet in next *ch1 sk1 treble_crochet in row 1 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet in next *ch1 sk1 double_crochet 3 repeat from *across 98 in 3 repeat from *across 98 row 2 ch3 treble_crochet in 2 *ch1 sk1 treble_crochet in 3 repeat from *across row 2 ch3 double_crochet in 2 *ch1 sk1 double_crochet in 3 repeat from *across change colour change colour row 3 ch4 sk1 treble_crochet in next extended treble_crochet in ch1-space two row 3 ch4 sk1 double_crochet in next extended double_crochet in ch1-space two row below treble_crochet in next *ch1 sk1 treble_crochet in next^ extended row below double_crochet in next *ch1 sk1 double_crochet in next^ extended treble_crochet in ch1-space two row below treble_crochet in next repeat from double_crochet in ch1-space two row below double_crochet in next repeat from *across ending at ^the last time *across ending at ^the last time row 4 ch4 sk1 treble_crochet in 3 *ch1 sk1 treble_crochet in 3 repeat from row 4 ch4 sk1 double_crochet in 3 *ch1 sk1 double_crochet in 3 repeat from *across to last two ch1 sk1 treble_crochet in last change colour *across to last two ch1 sk1 double_crochet in last change colour row 5 ch3 extended treble_crochet in ch1-space two row below treble_crochet in row 5 ch3 extended double_crochet in ch1-space two row below double_crochet next * ch1 sk1 treble_crochet in next extended treble_crochet in ch1-space two in next *ch1 sk1 double_crochet in next extended double_crochet in ch1-space two row below treble_crochet in next repeat from *across row below double_crochet in next repeat from *across row 6 ch3 treble_crochet in 2 *ch1 sk1 treble_crochet in 3 repeat from * across row 6 ch3 double_crochet in 2 *ch1 sk1 double_crochet in 3 repeat from * across change colour change colour row 3-6 create the pattern row 3-6 create the pattern row 7-70 repeat the pattern row 7-70 repeat the pattern row 71-72 repeat row 3 and 4 to finish row 71-72 repeat row 3 and 4 to finish resizing guide to adjust the size of your blanket you can just work more or less stitches and row as follows type of blanket finished blanket foundation chain no of row to size cm length work car seat/security 36 x 43 44 32 baby 76 x 89 92 60 lapghan
